entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron's leg has broken and his foot vanished from sight. He is unable to move without being in range of the tree's blows.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is bleeding due to a cut on her shoulder by the Willow tree. She is trying to get help for Ron and Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is trying to find a way through the branches of the tree to reach Ron, who has been injured by the tree. He is also trying to protect Hermione from the tree's blows.

entities.name: willow
entities.description: The Willow tree is attacking Harry, Ron, and Hermione with its branches. It has cut Hermione across her shoulder.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is a cat who helps Harry by slithering between the branches of the tree and placing his front paws on a knot on the trunk.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to help Ron, who has been injured by the tree. Harry is trying to find a way through the branches of the tree to reach Ron.
Harry is also trying to help Hermione, who is bleeding due to a cut on her shoulder by the Willow tree.
Crookshanks helps Harry by slithering between the branches of the tree and placing his front paws on a knot on the trunk.
